title.narrative: English in Action: Project implementation and management costs

description.narrative: This activity (English in Action: Project implementation and management costs) is a component of English in Action - EIA reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £48,696,546. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Education facilities and training, Teacher training, Primary education, Basic life skills for youth and adults, Secondary education. , with the following implementing partners: Mott MacDonald Limited. The start date is 01-09-2006 and the end date is 29-03-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Basic life skills for youth and adults
